backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as the backend canister entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the rebuild/redeploy feature with high confidence, linking ContactSection.tsx and multiple components to test REQ-13.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the single-page clutch repair business website with header, hero, services, location, contact sections, and footer components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining warm automotive theme with amber/orange primary colors and charcoal grays.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, description for the clutch repair business, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating the single-page layout with Header, HeroSection, ServicesSection, LocationSection, ContactSection, and Footer components.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying phone (8013648470), email (suvankar78saha@gmail.com), and business hours in three cards with icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with business summary, quick info list, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with wrench icon, business name 'Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center', and tagline in gradient background.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with headline, service highlights for trucks/buses/cars, hero banner image with error handling fallback, and decorative badge.
Location section with embedded Google Maps iframe and 'Get Directions' link to the shop's Google Maps location.
Services grid displaying four service cards (truck, bus, car clutch repair, leather replacement) with icons, descriptions, and lucide-react fallback icons on image load failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook using TanStack Query to create and manage authenticated or anonymous backend actor instances based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm automotive-themed color palette for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, container settings, border radius utilities, animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, and known issues for Maa Tara Clutch Plate Repairing Center business website, noting deployment accessibility problems and email display issues.
